constituent: amass, flowers, livestock, mysterious, top hat, cocoon, rice field, brains
koohiiStory1: One sneaky farmer wanted to amass a large collection of livestock. We all know that cows like to eat flowers, so he planted lines of flowers leading to his own fields. The livestock followed the lines, eating the flowers one by one, and amassed in his field.
koohiiStory2: Kobe beef. The Japanese amass a fortune pampering livestock feeding them flowers, offering beer, playing music and giving them massages… RTK2:　チク　蓄電池　ちくでんち(battery cell)…　Pure Group:　畜1384.
words:
蓄積(ちくせき): accumulation, accumulate, store
貯蓄(ちょちく): savings
蓄える(たくわえる): to store
